Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

RIB_DATA_SUBTYPE

The basic type RIB_DATA_SUBTYPE describes the variable type of the RIB entry.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 RIB_NONE Entry has no type (usually a callable function). (Debugger value: 0).
 RIB_CUSTOM Entry is a pointer to an application-specific structure. (Debugger value: 1).
 RIB_DEC Entry is a 32-bit integer value to be reported in decimal. (Debugger value: 2).
 RIB_HEX Entry is a 32-bit integer value to be reported in hex. (Debugger value: 3).
 RIB_FLOAT Entry is a 32-bit single-precision FP value. (Debugger value: 4).
 RIB_PERCENT Entry is a 32-bit single-precision FP value to be reported as percentage. (Debugger value: 5).
 RIB_BOOL Entry is a boolean-constrained integer value to be reported as TRUE or FALSE. (Debugger value: 6).
 RIB_STRING Entry is a pointer to a null-terminated ASCII strings. (Debugger value: 7).


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Structures: RIB_INTERFACE_ENTRY
